name: YouTube: better mainpage + channels for FullHD
description: [alpha-1] Make channels and main page look better on FullHD-screens by giving the content more width and blocking featured channels. Should be compatible with other styles.
additional_info:
# v0.1
+ Blocks featured channels 
+ sets the width of main page and channels

# v0.1.1
+ fixed settings-page

# v0.2
+ fixed banner height
